name: BEAM (itch) (Super Game Bros.)
description:
HOW TO PLAY : 

Use the arrow keys / WASD to move between tiles. Be careful, you're double will move with you.

Moving against object may move them if they can be moved.

Move the objects around you to help you redirect the laser to hit the crystal on the opposite side, to open the door.

Comment below if you're able to beat it.

All source and assets for this game and more -> https://ko-fi.com/s/f2cc55ff3a
